alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont County through 715 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Riverton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Fremont County, including the following locations... Arapahoe Elementary School, St Stephens, Bonneville, Riverton Landfill, Fremont County Fairgrounds and Riverton Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin
